name: Among The Birds
description:
Among The Birds is a knock-off game of two widely known titles "Among Us" and "Flappy Bird". You know the goal - get through as many pipes as you can without touching one. #flappy #bird #flappybird #among #us #amongus #birds #pointnclick #arcade

UPDATES:
V1.1:

  • Fixed invisible pipe glitch.
  • Fixed glitchy sound.
  • Added new sounds along with 2 music tracks (much more enjoyable) 
Install instructions

Download 64bit or 32bit depending on your PC then just extract the files anywhere and open up "Among_The_Birds.exe". HAVE FUN! I'll be waiting for your feedback :)
